title: Todo List
description: This project involves a to-do list that allows users to add, edit, and delete task functionalities

title: Sales Invoice
description: This project involves an invoice app that allows users to select products, adjust prices on hover, delete items, and add new products dynamically.

title: Shopping Cart
description: This project involves an e-commerce shopping cart that allows users to add, update, and remove items.

title: Contact App
description: This project involves a contact creation form that allows users to add, edit, and delete contact details.
